# Claude Code Review Slash Commands

This directory contains slash commands for the Claude Code Review GitHub Action.

## Available Commands

### `/review`
Trigger an immediate code review on the current pull request.

### `/explain`
Ask Claude to explain a specific piece of code or concept.

### `/suggest`
Request suggestions for code improvements.

### `/docs`
Ask for documentation improvements or explanations.

## Usage

These commands can be used in pull request comments to interact with the Claude Code Review assistant.
